title: Add Muffler Upgrade to 'upgrades'
description: Not on my PC ATM, don't want to mess around on forums. Just putting this here as a reminder to me (or if someone else wants to do it, go ahead) to add the muffler upgrade to upgrades page.

replies.body: By forums, I meant wiki, and by mess around, I mean mess with any pages, in case I make a mistake on my phone.
